readability_reflection: I find it more readable using string concatenation because that's how we got through during my classes.
comprehension_debugging: Yes, in one of the tasks that uses interpolation, I was trying to multiply the number instead of just adding to the sentence.
preference_rationale: It totally depends, for example, if I'm using operator overloading and the operator is +, I'm going to use interpolation to add on a sentence instead of concatenation.
learning_curve: It felt simple adding the two strings together, especially using the plus operator. But I remember using str() to convert the number to a string, so it gave a little bit of complication in completing the tasks.
suggestions_improvement: I would use both when needed. It is very important to understand them and use them correctly, and make sure to comment them in the projects just in case some one si not familiar with.
